item.title: J1 International Student Guide
item.description: In many ways, getting the visa for my US internship was harder than getting the internship itself - after all, there is no Leetcode to help you get through USCIS bureaucracy. Though there is some information online, it can feel scattered and hard to find. This is particularly true for non-Canadian citizens since we have an additional interview at the US Consulate. Thatâ€™s where this guide (hopefully) comes in. Before I begin, here are some excellent guides made by other UW students you may want to check out as well:
